entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.48.4
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix(pipedrive): add api version for webhook (#7163) @kishanprmr
  • feat(ethereum name service): List ENS Domains action (#6955) @reemayoush

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: make sure all flows are published before pushing to git (#7167) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(data-selector): show child properties when searching for a step name (#7166) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add reemayoush as a contributor for plugin (#7162) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @reemayoush

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.48.7
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat: personal AI, TrueLayer, Mailchain, anyhook graphql/websocket pieces (#7164) @kishanprmr
  • feat(wedof): updating wedof piece (#7181) @obenazouz-wedof

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: allow for getting piece metadata with API key and project ID (#7207) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: disable platform admin from being deactivated (#7189) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @obenazouz-wedof
